name: Siege cannons
description: Extremely powerful, but slow to reload.

name: Deck cannons
description: The standard cannon, with which any pirate would be comfortable.

name: Corvette
description: A highly maneuverable, lightly armed warship.

name: Battleship
description: A slower but heavily armored and heavily gunned warship.

name: Frigate
description: A versatile warship with both good firing power and maneuverability.

name: Heavy armor
description: Metal plates that protect the ship from incoming enemy rounds, but makes the ship heavier and slows it down.

name: Light armor
description: Light weight armor that makes the ship faster and more maneuverable, but also more vulnerable.

name: Medium armor
description: Standard armor that does not significantly affect the ship's speed or the damage taken from enemy rounds.

name: Triple-stich sails
description: Sails sewn together with the triple-stich method are stronger, and generate more speed than normal sails.

name: Armor piercing rounds
description: Cannon amunition made to penetrate the armor of enemy ships and cause massive damage.

name: Gunlocks
description: Cannons with a gunlock firing mechanism takes less time to prepare before a new round can be fired.
